text: @KellyO @VP I know Mother Pence would not be allowed to have lunch alone with any man; but that doesn't make Joe dangerous. Pence is complicit in killing an entire town in Indiana when he was Governor. How lucky are we to have a man as dangerous as Pence leading a COVID-19 task force?
